mapper.select: select s.school_no, s.name, s.photo, (select count(*) from school_users u where s.school_no = u.school_no) as now_member_count from schools as s order by now_member_count desc
select school_no, name, content from schools where name like #{name}
select school_no, name, stop, open_range from schools where school_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update schools set stop=1 where school_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select s.school_no, s.name, s.limited_man, s.photo, s.created_at, s.limited_at, count(u.school_no) as now_man from schools s inner join school_users u on s.school_no = u.school_no group by u.school_no order by school_no desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.update: update schools set limited_at = #{date} where school_no = #{schoolNo}
mapper.select: select s.school_no, s.name, s.limited_man, s.photo, s.created_at, s.limited_at, count(u.school_no) as now_man from schools s inner join school_users u on s.school_no = u.school_no where s.name like '%${schoolInfo}%' group by u.school_no order by school_no desc
